concept.title: Jython Evaluator
concept.shortdesc: The Jython Evaluator processes data based on custom Jython script. Use the Jython Evaluator to incorporate custom Jython script in a pipeline.

conbody.p: Jython EvaluatoroverviewprocessorsJython EvaluatorThe Jython Evaluator can process records as follows: more info for these - currently conreffing reusable phrases:
